text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with fresh strawberry cheesecake
sauce also known as strawberry sauce
alright so we're gonna start with 1 pint
of fresh beautiful strawberries i just
cut the tops off well throw those in a
little saucepan with some sugar and then
the top secret ingredient a little
splash of balsamic vinegar believe it or
not alright to that I'm going to add
just a couple tablespoons of water we're
gonna put that on medium heat and we're
gonna cook these very very simple
process here
now some people puree the strawberries
first and then cook them I do it the
other way around so we're gonna bring
that to a simmer and give it a stir yes
that is the freakishly small wooden
spoon we're gonna cover that turn the
heat down to medium-low and let that
cook for about 15 minutes
alright in the meantime I'm gonna mix
one teaspoon of cornstarch with a couple
tablespoons of cold water that's gonna
thicken the sauce later just a little
bit okay so about 15 minutes later we're
gonna uncover that and that's what it
looks like and it's pretty pretty
beautiful I think by the way at this
point if you decided to just send
someone out for vanilla ice cream and
just say screw this recipe I'm just
going to pour this over ice cream we
need it nobody would blame you totally
good idea but what we're gonna do is
we're gonna whisk in that cornstarch
water mixture and as soon as it looks
like it's mixed in and as soon as the
mixture thickens just slightly see that
alright looks like a nice strawberry
syrup turn off the heat because
cornstarch doesn't need to be cooked
alright after a minute or two it
thickens that you're all good so we're
turning off the heat we're gonna throw
that in a blender and we're gonna puree
until very smooth now one heads up when
you use a blender to puree this versus
like putting it through a strainer or
something it will introduce air into it
which makes it look lighter than it's
going to be so when this cools and
settles it's gonna darken up so don't
worry about that kind of pink color
you'll see here we'll even this was
pretty fresh but it will get it will get
even darker than that and I love this
recipe on all kinds of things but it's
just so perfect with cheesecake has a
great texture because it is a cook
yet it still has that fresh strawberry
taste I really like and again that
little secret - of balsamic vinegar just
you know to mess with people that's in
there no one will ever be able to figure
it out and there it is just a really
really cool looking tasting super easy
fruit sauce for ice cream pies cakes you
name it but in particular cheesecake so
hopefully you watched our cheesecake
